titleStmt.title: The Spaniards monarchie, and Leaguers olygarchie. Layd open in an aduerisement [sic], written by Signor Vasco Figueiro a gentleman of Portingale to the rebellious French: wherein is discouered the tyrannie of the one ouer the kingdome of Portingale, and the treacherous rebellion of the other in the kingdome of France, with a patheticall persuasion to the French to returne to the obedience of their naturall and legitimate king. Englished by H.O.
titleStmt.author: Figueiro, Vasco, gentleman of Portingale.
H. O., fl. 1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Field for Iohn Harison,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
